expiration

protected java.util.Date expiration
Constructor Detail

AbstractCacheable

public AbstractCacheable(java.lang.Object data)
The AbstractCacheable class instance is created by an object extending this class for purposes of caching the data it contains. Thus, a cache object cannot be created without having data.
Parameters:
data:Ljava.lang.Object - representation of the information to cache.

AbstractCacheable

public AbstractCacheable(java.lang.String ID,
                         java.lang.Object data)
The AbstractCacheable class instance is created by an object extending this class for purposes of caching the data it contains. Thus, a cache object cannot be created without having data. Also, the ID of the CacheableIF object is specified allowing the CacheableIF object to identify itself to the cache, using the CacheIF.write(:CacheableIF) method.
Parameters:
ID:Ljava.lang.String - object specifying the unique identifier of this CacheableIF object in the cache.
data:Ljava.lang.Object - representation of the information to cache.
